title: Amid high COE prices, remember goal of car-lite society
title_page: Amid high COE prices, remember goal of car-lite society | The Straits Times
maintext:
Singapore has long aspired to be car-lite as part of its strategy to combat climate change and to provide a liveable environment for residents.
When this car-lite vision was announced by Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong in 2014 during the launch of the Sustainable Singapore Blueprint, he articulated a three-pronged approach to get there: Expanding the public transport system, providing alternative modes of transport and cutting dependence on private cars.
